title: Cabinet Sub-Committee to study report on Draft Constitution;
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has decided to appoint a Sub-Committee to study the contents of the preliminary report on drafting a new constitution for the country.

The Cabinet of Ministers has decided on 09.09.2020 to appoint a committee consisting of legal experts under the chairmanship of President’s Counsel Romesh de Silva to draft a new constitution. The preliminary report of the committee has been submitted to the President on 25.04.2022.
